trans-unit.source: Represents an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) and the Remarks section on this page for usage information and examples.
trans-unit.target: 如需用法資訊和範例，請參閱 [XElement 類別概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)及本頁面上的＜備註＞一節。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an XML element, the fundamental XML construct.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表 XML 項目時，基本的 XML 建構。

trans-unit.source: See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) for other usage information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XElement 類別概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)其他使用方式資訊。

trans-unit.source: An element has an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>, optionally one or more attributes, and can optionally contain content (for more information, see <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Nodes%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 項目有<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>，您可以選擇一或多個屬性，並可選擇性地包含內容 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Nodes%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> can contain the following types of content:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>可以包含下列類型的內容：

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content of an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊的有效內容<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> derives from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>, which derives from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> 衍生自<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>，其衍生自<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode>。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> methods can be used from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>方法可從 XAML。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [LINQ to XML 動態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 如需可以傳遞給這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: There is an implicit conversion from string to <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>.
trans-unit.target: 從字串到隱含轉換<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>。

trans-unit.source: Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>。

trans-unit.source: When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> and a string to create an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>.
trans-unit.target: 在命名空間中建立項目時，典型用法就是要使用加法運算子多載與<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>和字串，以建立<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> class from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 物件初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor iterates through the contents of the specified <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>, and creates an element with its contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式逐一查看的指定內容<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>，並建立其內容的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a source XML tree, and then creates an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement> from a query on the source XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立來源 XML 樹狀結構，並接著會建立<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>來源 XML 樹狀結構上的查詢。

trans-unit.source: It then serializes the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement> to the console, adds a new element to the source XML tree, and then serializes the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement> again.
trans-unit.target: 然後序列化<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>主控台中，將新的項目加入到來源的 XML 樹狀，並再將資料序列化<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>一次。

trans-unit.source: You can see that element newly added to the source XML tree is not included in the first serialization, but is included in the second.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到該元素新增至來源的 XML 樹狀結構未包含在第一次序列化，但包含在第二個。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace" />，包含這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations may be persisted as attributes in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間宣告可能會保存為 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: These special attributes declare namespaces, including default namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 這些特殊屬性宣告命名空間，包括預設的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This method finds the namespace declaration that declares the default namespace, if there is one, and returns the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> for the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會尋找命名空間宣告會宣告預設命名空間中，如果有的話，並傳回<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: If there is no attribute that declares the default namespace, then this method returns <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有宣告預設命名空間的屬性，則這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When creating XML trees using C#, even if an XML tree would be serialized with a default namespace, if the namespace is not persisted in the XML tree as an attribute, this method will not report the namespace as the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在建立 XML 樹狀結構，使用 C# 中，即使命名空間不會保存為屬性的 XML 樹狀結構中，就可使用預設命名空間中，序列化 XML 樹狀結構時，這個方法不會報告命名空間當做預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: When creating XML trees using Visual Basic and XML literals, if you create the XML in a default namespace using the Imports statement, then a namespace attribute will be created in the tree by the Visual Basic compiler, and this method will report that namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用匯入陳述式的預設命名空間中建立 XML，請建立使用 Visual Basic 和 XML 常值的 XML 樹狀結構，然後命名空間屬性將會建立在樹狀目錄中的 Visual Basic 編譯器，以及這個方法會報告該命名空間。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料流建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 執行個體，並選擇性地保留空白字元、設定基底 URI，以及保留行資訊。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 物件，用於建立資料流包含的資料。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload methods and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> methods that read and parse the document.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載的方法和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>讀取和剖析文件的方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果您需要修改<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>，執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> by calling one of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> overloads that take <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>透過呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>多載會採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to one of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>'s <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A> overloads that takes <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>的其中一個<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>的<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A>多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> that will be read for the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />，將從中讀取 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions" /> that specifies white space behavior, and whether to load base URI and line information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions" />，其指定泛空白字元 (White Space) 的行為，以及是否要載入基底 URI 和行資訊。

trans-unit.source: Loads an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> from a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />, optionally preserving white space and retaining line information.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 載入 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />，並選擇性地保留泛空白字元和行資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> that contains the XML that was read from the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />，包含從指定之 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 讀取的 XML。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Nodes of type <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText> are created for both significant and insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 節點類型<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText>供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, not setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is not indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A> to create an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> from a string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A>建立<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>從包含 XML 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri> will have no effect when loading from a <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri>從載入時，會有任何作用<xref:System.IO.TextReader>。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance penalty if you set the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo> flag.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構載入文件之後，行資訊可能會沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload methods and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> methods that read and parse the document.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載的方法和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>讀取和剖析文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Nodes of type <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText> are created for both significant and insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 節點類型<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText>供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, not setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is not indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A> to create an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> from a string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A>建立<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>從包含 XML 的字串。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance penalty if you set the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo> flags.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The base URI and the line information are accurate immediately after loading the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 基底 URI 與行資訊正確後立即載入 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the base URI and line information may become meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件，基底 URI 和行資訊可能會沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload methods and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> methods that read and parse the document.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載的方法和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>讀取和剖析文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> will be configured to either read whitespace or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>或不會設定為其中一個讀取的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The LINQ to XML tree will be populated with the whitespace nodes that the reader surfaces.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 樹狀結構將會填入泛空白字元節點的讀取器介面。

trans-unit.source: This will be the behavior regardless of whether <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> is set or not.
trans-unit.target: 這是不論是否行為<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>或未設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> may have a valid base URI or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>或不可能有有效的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri>, the base URI will be set in the XML tree from the base URI that is reported by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri>，基底 URI 將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的基底 URI 從<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> may have a valid line information or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>或不可能有有效的線條資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>, the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>，行資訊將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的行資訊從<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Because all classes that derive from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject> contain a <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.NodeType%2A> property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>.

trans-unit.source: Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後在集合中每個節點的節點型別可以測試您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601.
trans-unit.target: 屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容的值空間是與密切相關的日期和時間以 ISO 8601 所述。

trans-unit.source: When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification.
trans-unit.target: 建立屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容時，根據 W3C 規格格式化屬性或項目值。

trans-unit.source: See the W3C specification for more details.
trans-unit.target: W3C 規格，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is lax when casting to a <xref:System.Nullable%601> of <xref:System.DateTime> from an attribute or element.
trans-unit.target: 若要進行轉換時，則行為是 lax<xref:System.Nullable%601>的<xref:System.DateTime>從屬性或項目。

trans-unit.source: Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a <xref:System.Nullable%601> of <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 即使屬性或項目值的格式不完全是依據 W3C 規格，值會適當地轉換成<xref:System.Nullable%601>的<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This conversion operator uses <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to convert from a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 此轉換運算子會使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>轉換<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: Load an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> from a string that contains XML, optionally preserving white space and retaining line information.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 XML 的字串載入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />，並選擇性地保留泛空白字元和程式行資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 XML。

trans-unit.source: Load an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> from a string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 XML 的字串載入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> populated from the string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 XML 的字串填入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not preserve white space.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會保留泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If you want to preserve white space in the XML tree, use the overload of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A> method that takes <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要保留 XML 樹狀結構中的空白字元，使用的多載<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A>採用方法<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload methods and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> methods that read and parse the document.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載的方法和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>讀取和剖析文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立包含 XML 的字串。

trans-unit.source: It then parses the string into an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會剖析字串插入<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 XML。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions" /> that specifies white space behavior, and whether to load base URI and line information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions" />，其指定泛空白字元 (White Space) 的行為，以及是否要載入基底 URI 和行資訊。

trans-unit.source: Load an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> from a string that contains XML, optionally preserving white space and retaining line information.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 XML 的字串載入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />，並選擇性地保留泛空白字元和程式行資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> populated from the string that contains XML.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 XML 的字串填入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Nodes of type <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText> are created for both significant and insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 節點類型<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XText>供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is indented, not setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space.
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。

trans-unit.source: If the source XML is not indented, setting the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace> flag in `options` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace>加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri> will have no effect when parsing from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetBaseUri>從剖析時，會有任何作用<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> may have a valid line information or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>或不可能有有效的線條資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>, the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>，行資訊將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的行資訊從<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance penalty if you set the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo> flag.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響<xref:System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions.SetLineInfo>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構載入文件之後，行資訊可能會沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload methods and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> methods that read and parse the document.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載的方法和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>讀取和剖析文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this element's underlying XML tree.

trans-unit.source: The output can be saved to a file, an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" />, a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />, or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 輸出可以儲存至 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" />、<see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, formatting (indenting) can be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇停用格式化 (縮排)。

trans-unit.source: The stream to output this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 輸出的目的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Outputs this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 輸出到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The serialized XML will be indented.
trans-unit.target: 將縮排序列化的 XML。

trans-unit.source: All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented.
trans-unit.target: 將會移除所有無意義的空格，並會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為是將不會保留不顯著泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control white space, use the overload of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A> that takes <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A>採用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> option to save unindented XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>將未縮排的 XML 儲存選項。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致寫入器寫入所有空白完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.OmitDuplicateNamespaces> option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.OmitDuplicateNamespaces>選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> will be written to.
trans-unit.target: 向其中寫入 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.target: 將會移除所有無意義的空格，並會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method is that white space will not be preserved.

trans-unit.source: If you want to control white space, use the overload of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A> that allows you to specify <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A>，可讓您指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).

trans-unit.source: If you want to control white space, use the overload of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A> that allows you to specify <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A>，可讓您指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, saves the document to a file, and then prints the file to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，將文件儲存至檔案，然後列印到主控台檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> will be written to.
trans-unit.target: 向其中寫入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this element to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個項目序列化成 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to save an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何將 <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> 儲存為 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: The stream to output this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 輸出的目的資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" /> object that specifies formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 指定格式化行為的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Outputs this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, optionally specifying formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 輸出至指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，選擇性地指定格式化行為。

trans-unit.source: By default the `options` are set to <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.None>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設`options`設為<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.None>。

trans-unit.source: This option will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented.
trans-unit.target: 此選項會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save unindented XML, specify the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> flag for `options`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>旗標，以`options`。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致寫入器寫入所有空白完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.OmitDuplicateNamespaces> option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.OmitDuplicateNamespaces>選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to output the XML to.
trans-unit.target: 做為 XML 之輸出目標的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" /> that specifies formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 指定格式化行為的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this element to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />, optionally disabling formatting.
trans-unit.target: 將這個項目序列化成 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save unindented XML, specify the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> flag for `options`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>旗標，以`options`。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致寫入器寫入的所有空白字元完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> flag for `options`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>旗標，以`options`。

trans-unit.source: This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A> methods that do not take `options` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A>方法不接受`options`做為參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two uses of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用法。

trans-unit.source: The first use preserves white space.
trans-unit.target: 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The second serializes the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> with formatting.
trans-unit.target: 第二個序列化<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>格式。

trans-unit.source: Because the document has no white space in it as constructed, preserving white space outputs the XML without any indenting.
trans-unit.target: 文件不有任何空格所建構，因為保留泛空白字元輸出沒有縮排的 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name of the file.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案名稱的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" /> that specifies formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 指定格式化行為的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this element to a file, optionally disabling formatting.
trans-unit.target: 將這個元素序列化成檔案 (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save unindented XML, specify the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> flag for `options`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>旗標，以`options`。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致寫入器寫入的所有空白字元完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting> flag for `options`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions.DisableFormatting>旗標，以`options`。

trans-unit.source: This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A> methods that do not take `options` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Save%2A>方法不接受`options`做為參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two uses of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用法。

trans-unit.source: The first use preserves white space.
trans-unit.target: 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The second one serializes the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> with formatting.
trans-unit.target: 第二個序列化<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>格式。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> that contains the name of the attribute to change.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />，包含要變更之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute is removed if the value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 <see langword="null" />，則會移除屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value is converted to its string representation and assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute.Value" /> property of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 否則，值會轉換為其字串表示並指派給屬性 (Attribute) 的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute.Value" /> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of an attribute, adds an attribute, or removes an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定屬性的值、加入屬性或移除屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to make it easy to maintain a list of name/value pairs as a set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被為了便於維護一組屬性為名稱/值組的清單。

trans-unit.source: When maintaining the list, you need to add pairs, modify pairs, or delete pairs.
trans-unit.target: 維護的清單，當您要加入、 修改組，或刪除組。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method passing a name that does not exist as an attribute, this method creates an attribute for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法不存在的名稱傳遞做為屬性，這個方法會為您建立的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method passing the name of an existing attribute, this method modifies the value of the attribute to the value that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法傳遞現有屬性的名稱，這個方法會修改您指定的值屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `value`, this method removes the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入`null`如`value`，這個方法會移除屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The value is assigned to the attribute with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 將值指派至具有指定名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no attribute with the specified name exists, a new attribute is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有指定名稱的屬性不存在，則會加入新的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the attribute with the specified name, if any, is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`null`，刪除具有指定之名稱的屬性如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Maintaining Name/Value Pairs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[維護名稱/值組](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an element with an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立具有屬性的元素。

trans-unit.source: It then uses this method to replace the content of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會使用這個方法來取代屬性的內容。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> that contains the name of the child element to change.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />，包含要變更之子項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the child element.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給子元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The child element is removed if the value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 <see langword="null" />，會移除子項目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value is converted to its string representation and assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Value" /> property of the child element.
trans-unit.target: 否則，值會轉換為其字串表示並指派給子項目的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Value" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a child element, adds a child element, or removes a child element.
trans-unit.target: 設定子元素的值、加入子元素或移除子元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to make it easy to maintain a list of name/value pairs as a set of children elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被為了便於維護為子系項目的一組名稱/值組的清單。

trans-unit.source: When maintaining the list, you need to add pairs, modify pairs, or delete pairs.
trans-unit.target: 維護的清單，當您要加入、 修改組，或刪除組。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method passing a name that does not exist as a child element, this method creates a child element for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法不存在的名稱傳遞做為子項目，這個方法會為您建立的子元素。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method passing the name of an existing child element, this method modifies the value of the child element to the value that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法傳遞現有的子元素的名稱，這個方法會修改您指定的值的子元素的值。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `value`, this method removes the child element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入`null`如`value`，這個方法會移除子項目。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise events.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The value is assigned to the first child element with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 將值指派至具有指定名稱的第一個子元素。

trans-unit.source: If no child element with the specified name exists, a new child element is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有具有指定名稱的子系元素存在，則會加入新的子項目。

trans-unit.source: If the value is null, the first child element with the specified name, if any, is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 null，第一個子元素具有指定名稱，如果有的話，會刪除。

trans-unit.source: This method does not add child nodes or attributes to the specified child element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會將子節點或屬性加入指定的子項目。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if any object that derives from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject> is passed as `value`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法擲回例外狀況，如果任何物件，衍生自<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>被當做`value`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Maintaining Name/Value Pairs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[維護名稱/值組](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an element with a child element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立與子元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: It then uses this method to set the value of the child element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會使用這個方法來設定子項目的值。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to this element.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給這個元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value is converted to its string representation and assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值會轉換為其字串表示並指派給 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Value" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of this element.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個元素的值。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is invalid to pass an instance of a class that derives from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>, such as <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.
trans-unit.target: 是無效的傳遞衍生自類別的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>，例如<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an element that contains a child element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立包含子元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: It then sets the value of the element using this method.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會設定使用這個方法之項目的值。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an XML schema definition that describes the XML representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 結構描述定義，描述這個物件的 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method and consumed by the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />，描述物件的 XML 表示，該物件由 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> 方法產生，由 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> 方法取用。

trans-unit.source: This method is part of implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是實作的一部分<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>介面。

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally for serializing object graphs that contain LINQ to XML objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在內部用來序列化物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of serializing an object graph that contains LINQ to XML objects, see [Serializing Object Graphs that Contain XElement Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5).
trans-unit.target: 如需序列化物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件的範例，請參閱[Serializing 物件圖形，包含 XElement 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> from which the object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 物件從其中還原序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates an object from its XML representation.
trans-unit.target: 從物件的 XML 表示產生該物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is part of implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是實作的一部分<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>介面。

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally for serializing object graphs that contain LINQ to XML objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在內部用來序列化物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of serializing an object graph that contains LINQ to XML objects, see [Serializing Object Graphs that Contain XElement Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5).
trans-unit.target: 如需序列化物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件的範例，請參閱[Serializing 物件圖形，包含 XElement 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to which this object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化此物件至的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object into its XML representation.
trans-unit.target: 將物件轉換成其 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally for marshaling object graphs that contain LINQ to XML objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在內部用來封送處理的物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of serializing an object graph that contains LINQ to XML objects, see [Serializing Object Graphs that Contain XElement Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5).
trans-unit.target: 如需序列化物件圖形包含 LINQ to XML 物件的範例，請參閱[Serializing 物件圖形，包含 XElement 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/443d7904-a6f0-450a-b1a4-5d7ed869d1d5)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the concatenated text contents of this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個元素的串連文字內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains all of the text content of this element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個項目的所有文字內容。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple text nodes, they will be concatenated.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個文字節點，將會串連它們。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can get or set the value of an element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，取得或設定項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性將會引發<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to get the value of an element but you are not sure that it exists, it is more convenient to use the explicit conversion operators, and assign the element to a nullable type such as `string` or <xref:System.Nullable%601> of <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得項目的值，但您不確定它是否存在，則更方便使用的明確轉換運算子，並將指派給項目可為 null 的型別例如`string`或<xref:System.Nullable%601>的<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: If the element does not exist, the nullable type is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不存在，可為 null 的型別會設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, if you want to use this property, you must make sure that the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A> method does not return `null` before you access this property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果您想要使用這個屬性，您必須確定<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A>方法不會傳回`null`才能存取這個屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用這個屬性，以擷取具有混合內容的項目文字。
